name: Uta
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking Once Per Turn Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [FILM] type card, add it to your hand. Then, return the remaining card to the bottom of your deck.

effect.text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [FILM] type card, add it to your hand. Then, return the remaining card to the bottom of your deck.
